title: Mighty Dragon
desc:
*Never steal from a dragon's hoard.*

A slow and patient killer, with potently dangerous fire breath that will simultanously minimize your damage rolls and create a stacking damage-over-time effect that only goes away when the fight ends.

Try to bring plenty of healing items just in case, and avoid waepons with low minimum damage. Most damage modifying effects will apply to your minimum damage, just as much as your maximum. In addition, the Lucky effect can somewhat counteract the effects of Overheating, by at least giving you equal chances to roll min or max damage.
